metadata.synopsis: After player/Jaheira talk to Danthelon and get the key to go to basement, Danthelon orders a guard to hold the door and not let anyone for a while.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Part of behaviors, not implemented yet

1.speaker: Entharl Danthelon
1.text: Right Somi, you're on the door 'til our friends are done. Gods forbid we do any business today.
1.context: NodeContext: SOM-ee. Feigned put-upon, you're closing your shop so your spy friends can have their meeting.

0.speaker: Somi
0.text: Ain't had a customer yet anyway.
0.context: NodeContext: Baldly puncturing your boss' pretense that business is booming

2.speaker: Entharl Danthelon
2.text: Oof. At least pretend to whisper, pal.
2.context: NodeContext: Casual mock-hurt - this is standard chat with your employee, not a big display
